org.nanoko.coffee.mill.mojos.compile

Class OptiPNGMojo

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo
      • org.nanoko.coffee.mill.mojos.AbstractCoffeeMillMojo
        • org.nanoko.coffee.mill.mojos.compile.OptiPNGMojo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.maven.plugin.ContextEnabled, org.apache.maven.plugin.Mojo

    public class OptiPNGMojo
extends AbstractCoffeeMillMojo
    Optimizes PNG files using optiPNG (http://optipng.sourceforge.net/). OptiPNG must be installed and the executable `optipng` available form the system path.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected int optiPngOptimizationLevel
      The optiPNG optimization level among 0-7.
      boolean optiPNGVerbose
      Enables the verbose mode of optiPNG.
      protected boolean skipOptiPNG
      Skips the PNG files optimization.
